description.value:
Healing, Necrotic

Aura 5

Any living creature that enters the aura or starts its turn in the aura takes 20 necrotic damage. For each creature that takes damage from his aura, Dragotha regains 5 hit points.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 4

+38 vs AC; 2d10+11 damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Necrotic

Standard

Reach 4

+38 vs AC; 1d10+11 damage, and Dragotha makes a secondary attack against the same target.

Secondary Attack +36 vs Fortitude; 2d12+5 necrotic damage, and the target is weakened (save ends).

Encounter ✦ Necrotic

Standard

Dragotha makes two claw attacks and one bite attack

At-Will

Standard

Ranged 10

+35 vs Will; Will; the target is pushed 1 square and is stunned (save ends). Aftereffect: The target takes 20 necrotic damage and is weakened (save ends both).

At-Will

Minor, At-Will

Ranged 10

Automatic hit; the target provokes opportunity attacks when it shifts (save ends)

Encounter ✦ Cold, Fire, Poison

Standard

Close blast 10

+36 vs Reflex; 3d12+11 cold, fire, and poison damage, and the target loses one healing surge. Miss: Half damage, and the target does not lose a healing surge.

Encounter ✦ Necrotic

Standard

Close blast 10

+34 vs Fortitude; 3d12+11 necrotic damage, and ongoing 10 necrotic damage (save ends), and the target's necrotic resistance is negated until the end of the encounter.

Encounter ✦ Necrotic

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

Dragotha's death wind recharges, and the dragon uses it immediately.

Encounter ✦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 20

Targets enemies; +36 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of Dragotha's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

At-Will ✦ Fear

Immediate Interrupt

Close blast 3

Trigger: When an enemy makes a melee attack against dragotha, at-will

+36 vs Will; the target is immobilized and takes a -4 penalty to attack rolls until end of Dragotha's next turn. Miss: The target takes a -4 penalty to attack rolls until end of Dragotha's next turn.

system.biography:
HP 1430; Bloodied 715
Resist 30 necrotic Vulnerable 10 radiant Immune disease, fear, poison 		Init +23 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 48Fort 46Ref 46Will 46
Speed 8, fly 10, overland flight 16
Ability ScoresStr 33 (+26)
Con 30 (+25)		Dex 26 (+23)
Int 32 (+26)		Wis 28 (+24)
Cha 32 (+26)
Languages Common, Draconic
Alignment Evil
Skills Arcana +31, Endurance +30, History +31, Insight +29, Intimidate +31, Religion +31Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 34 | Insight 39
